name: Rassler - Pro Wrestling Career Mode
description:
Don't forget to tuck your chin, kid.

Rassler is a retro pro wrestling career simulation RPG, a hybrid of classic PC business management games (pioneered by folks like Wizard Games of Scotland, Impressions, and Bullfrog) and the early NES game design aesthetic. Gameplay focuses on trying to make ends meet and progress in the weird world of professional wrestling while keeping yourself healthy and making enough money to live on.

The Story

You are a brand-new pro wrestler in a world with a territorial system, meaning a system of geographic regions each controlled by a single booking office. You've got a couple bucks in the bank, and you wrestle every single day for your job. In between throwing your head at the ground for a living, you live like someone who travels every day of their life might- a lot of booze, some drugs if you want, personality clashes, random events, gym workouts, and a lot of being told what to do.

How Much Does It Cost?

Rassler is pay-what-you-can (PWYC). If you can support development, pay for the game here on itch. If you pay $3.00+ you'll get a cool exclusive magnet featuring one of the wrestlers from the game. 

I Have Suggestions!

Even if you don't pay, the Rassler Community is open to you and I'd be glad to have your feedback.

Release Notes are available in the devlog.
